snippet: The Ravens said the suggestion in Tom Brady’s lawsuit against the N.F.L. that they had told the Colts about deflated footballs used in their loss to the Patriots the previous week was untrue.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Baltimore Ravens deny alerting Indianapolis Colts about underinflated footballs before AFC championship game against New England Patriots; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Ravens said the suggestion in Tom Brady’s lawsuit against the N.F.L. that they had told the Colts about deflated footballs used in their loss to the Patriots the previous week was untrue.

headline.print_headline: Ravens Deny Alerting Colts About Footballs
headline.main: Ravens Deny Contacting Colts About Deflated Footballs
